The internet is always an internet. Anything you do and say here is only taken with a grain of salt. Some people here take a different persona, which mostly happens to be their inner egos and not the outside ego you put in front of your real life connections.

Irrelevant but... yeah. I never blend reality and fantasy but I do love NTR in fiction but not in reality. Because I'm partially a writer, I often need an open mind to make wide variety of stories to deliberately stir up people or pull their heart strings. Same for doujin artists. This is why Emergence became an infamous doujin due to it's ending.

Now, it's not our responsibility if someone gets the better of them and mix reality and fantasy. Writing is also a form of expressing our views on what actually happens irl and somewhat, open the reader's eyes to a wider view of the world.
@L-LEWD I got somewhat mad so I wanted to clarify my point of view and my comment got a little bit longer than I intended. But thank you for understanding my points, and have a nice day too.

The amount of idiots who can't distinguish from reality and view things only in extremes... there are people who just fap to it cus the fuck scenes are very arousing, rare is the vanilla that can achieve that and re-reading shit gets stale
Well even though I fap to NTR, it does some damage to my conscience and read some vanilla for healing. Well anyways have a nice day.

@EatShit it happens a lot lol   
@brudii There are some fiction that aren't based on reality and it seems that I didn't realize that this one is based on reality so this one's my fault. You don't like this that much so I won't pry and argue anymore (after this long-ass comment). It isn't really pathetic to get pissed off at this kind of scenario because it isn't normally moral. And I only pointed out what @02Her02 said and repeated it, I wasn't saying you were pathetic, sorry if that offended you. And regarding why people fap to this kinds of hentai even though they know it's wrong and doesn't do it in real life, I don't really know what goes through their heads but I'd guess the reason is that either they prefer hentai over real life, some random reason idk, or because it's not real and that's why they think it's ok. Some people find this types of scenarios to be hot and sexy and stuff and that's why they fap to it. As for me I just prefer 2D over 3D lol.

poster.username: A V E P A R T H E

body: Welp, the only reason I'm here's 'cause the art is acceptable, not saying the NTR and blackmail genre are good, or enjoyable (for me, at least), as brudii said, but not gonna criticize anyone for watching it or fapping to it.
Yall really be fighting on a porn site 😳😳

@L-LEWD I don't get what you mean by "difference between fiction and reality" becasue in this case, the fictional story is based on reality (even if it rarely happens but it happens). So what's the difference except that it is a drawing? Also, just like you said "this kind of scenario which many would not attempt because they know it is wrong... (even though some fap to it)", this is exactly the reason i'm pissed. It's wrong, people know it's wrong and would never attempt this in real life, but they still enjoy to see/read this kinde of stories. How can you enjoy this? Thats what i can't understand and thats why i'm pissed. People read this and enjoy seeing characters (that are genuinely good persons) suffer. They don't feel any empathy, and also root for the bad guy but i'm the pathetic one smh. I just don't get it.

@brudii if "any level-headed human" is pretty rare nowadays the world would be in a much more chaotic state. Being level-headed is what keeps people from doing this and know the difference between fiction and reality. I'm not saying that it doesn't happen in real life, but it rarely ever happens (not sure about other countries but it rarely happens in my country). What @02He02 is trying to say is that you're pathetic for getting pissed at this kind of scenario which many would not attempt because they know it is wrong and know the difference between hentai and real life (even though some fap to it).
@Abyss Kerberos he just said that the person is naive for thinking NTR doesn't happen in real life in case you read his comment wrong

@02Her02 The 800 fav is now 801, welcome to nhentai where many pieces of shit, including me, gather. Well humans are getting fuck up every passing day and I await on you joining our cult. @brudii And heyyy this really happens in RL, u aint watching news? Or never heard this anywhere? So jealous to be ignorant as you....

@brudii yeah I agree with u, every time I fap to ntr doujins I feel so guilty. I hate these kind of plot so I never self-insert myself into the characters (but sometimes Self-insert into those who get NTRed) This is just to make myself feel better after reading the fucking ntr doujins
Just to click on a doujin page to shit on people and calling them pathetic, really making a difference there buddy, i am sure u have established your moral superiority over everyone here
